MEETING INVITATION

Subject: Q1 Planning Team Meeting

Wednesday, January 15, 2025
10:00 AM - 11:30 AM EST
Main Office, Conference Room B
Zoom: https://zoom.us/j/123456789 (ID: 123 456 789)

Quarterly planning to review Q4 and set Q1 priorities.

AGENDA:
10:00 - Q4 Retrospective (Sarah Johnson)
10:15 - Q1 Goals and Priorities (Michael Chen) - 30 min
10:45 - Resource Allocation (Lisa Martinez) - 30 min
11:15 - Q&A and Action Items - 15 min

Required:
- Michael Chen (m.chen@company.com)
- Lisa Martinez (l.martinez@company.com)

RSVP by January 13th

Pre-read: Review Q4 report

Sarah Johnson, Product Team Lead
sarah.johnson@company.com
